stories.Title: Microsoft’s latest breakthrough
stories.Description: Meet Orca, a 13-billion parameter model developed by Microsoft researchers, that leverages GPT-4's explanation traces to enhance its training.
stories.Tweet: Microsoft’s latest breakthrough 📦 Meet Orca, a 13-billion parameter model developed by Microsoft researchers, that leverages GPT-4's explanation traces to enhance its training. #microsoft https://www.marktechpost.com/2023/06/13/microsoft-ai-introduces-orca-a-13-billion-parameter-model-that-learns-to-imitate-the-reasoning-process-of-lfms-large-foundation-models/

stories.Title: Vimeo is diving into the world of AI
stories.Description: With AI-powered tools, you can now create scripts, record effortlessly with a teleprompter, and avoid editing headaches. Forget the hustle and just focus on unleashing your creativity!
stories.Tweet: Vimeo is diving into the world of AI 📦 With AI-powered tools, you can now create scripts, record effortlessly with a teleprompter, and avoid editing headaches. Forget the hustle and just focus on unleashing your creativity! #vimeo https://techcrunch.com/2023/06/19/vimeo-introduces-a-trio-of-ai-powered-editing-features/

stories.Title: Give a warm welcome to Opera One
stories.Description: Upgrade your web browsing experience with the latest version of Opera browser. With native AI integration, you'll enjoy intelligent search results, code generation, and even customer support.
stories.Tweet: Give a warm welcome to Opera One 📦 Upgrade your web browsing experience with the latest version of Opera browser. With native AI integration, you'll enjoy intelligent search results, code generation, and even customer support. #opera https://www.zdnet.com/article/opera-one-is-officially-out-of-testing/

stories.Title: Is the AI label being used misguidedly?
stories.Description: Amid the AI mania, it's difficult to not get carried away with the buzz as tech companies are quick to label anything as "artificial intelligence."
stories.Tweet: Is the AI label being used misguidedly? 📦 Amid the AI mania, it's difficult to not get carried away with the buzz as tech companies are quick to label anything as "artificial intelligence." #ai https://www.axios.com/2023/06/20/ai-everything-definition-label-hype

stories.Title: The Supercharger frenzy grows
stories.Description: Rivian joins the ranks of leading automakers in pursuit of a standardized charging infrastructure. By allowing owners access to Tesla's Supercharger network via an adapter.
stories.Tweet: The Supercharger frenzy grows 📦 Rivian joins the ranks of leading automakers in pursuit of a standardized charging infrastructure. By allowing owners access to Tesla's Supercharger network via an adapter. #EVs https://www.engadget.com/rivian-owners-will-be-able-to-use-tesla-superchargers-starting-in-2024-141546633.html

stories.Title: Don't get lost in the NACS hype
stories.Description: The North American Charging Standard, first introduced by Tesla, it's becoming the preferred choice for EV charging. Make sure to read all about this growing trend.

stories.Title: From the cosmos to rescue operations
stories.Description: Scientists push innovation boundaries with the MuWNS. A groundbreaking technology that utilizes ultrafast subatomic particles called muons to create an accurate positioning system.
stories.Tweet: From the cosmos to rescue operations 📦 Scientists push innovation boundaries with the MuWNS. A groundbreaking technology that utilizes ultrafast subatomic particles called muons to create an accurate positioning system. #science https://www.space.com/cosmic-ray-gps-system-that-tracks-underground-movement-could-change-the-way-we-respond-to-disasters

stories.Title: Webb Telescope's insights on exoplanet habitability
stories.Description: Exploring the TRAPPIST-1 system for habitable conditions reveals a disappointing finding: TRAPPIST-1 c seems to lack a substantial atmosphere.
stories.Tweet: Webb Telescope's insights on exoplanet habitability 📦 Exploring the TRAPPIST-1 system for habitable conditions reveals a disappointing finding: TRAPPIST-1 c seems to lack a substantial atmosphere. #science https://www.nature.com/articles/d41586-023-01983-1

stories.Title: Boeing hasn't given up on Starliner
stories.Description: The company's CEO acknowledges the challenges faced by the CST-100 Starliner program but remains optimistic, as they’re determined to address the issues and deliver a reliable crew vehicle.
stories.Tweet: Boeing hasn't given up on Starliner 📦 The company's CEO acknowledges the challenges faced by the CST-100 Starliner program but remains optimistic, as they’re determined to address the issues and deliver a reliable crew vehicle. #starliner https://spacenews.com/boeing-ceo-says-company-still-committed-to-starliner/

stories.Title: Apple's slight change in Europe
stories.Description: New EU regulations call for Apple to ensure easy replacement of iPhone batteries, aligning with the growing need for more sustainable and long-lasting devices.
stories.Tweet: Apple's slight change in Europe 📦 New EU regulations call for Apple to ensure easy replacement of iPhone batteries, aligning with the growing need for more sustainable and long-lasting devices. #apple https://9to5mac.com/2023/06/19/iphone-user-replaceable-batteries-law/

stories.Title: No more unwanted interruptions
stories.Description: Worried about spam and scams? Stay calm. WhatsApp's new feature allows you to automatically mute calls from unknown numbers.
